title: "Learning Method Enables Robots to Learn by Watching Humans"
excerpt: "A new learning method developed by researchers at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) enables robots to directly learn from human-interaction videos and generalize the information to new tasks, which helps them learn how to carry out household chores."
